main event: A round, orange-red object was observed hovering in the sky over Grosse Pointe Woods, Michigan in 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to have control lights on various portions of it and seemed to be in orbit.
The object made a whistling sound and disappeared slowly as it rose.
Multiple witnesses, including a driver and a homeowner, observed the object and provided similar descriptions.
Photographs were taken but only showed a street light in the direction of the object, not the object itself.
The object was described as being on fire and making a humming or whirling sound like a large ducted fan or generator.
witnesses: Multiple civilian witnesses, including a driver and a homeowner
photographs: Yes, but they only showed a street light in the direction of the object
